TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Environment/SpecialFolder extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用于检索系统特殊文件夹的目录路径的枚举常数。

span.span: Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系统特殊文件夹是文件夹，如**Program Files**，**程序**，**系统**，或者**启动**，其中包含常见信息。The system special folders are folders such as **Program Files**, **Programs**, **System**, or **Startup**, which contain common information. 特殊文件夹时设置的默认系统，或由用户显式安装的 Windows 版本。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. 方法返回此枚举与关联的位置。The method returns the locations associated with this enumeration. 这些文件夹的位置可以具有不同的值在不同操作系统上，用户可以更改某些位置，位置已经进行了本地化。The locations of these folders can have different values on different operating systems, the user can change some of the locations, and the locations are localized. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅[KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) Windows 文档中的常量。For more information about special folders, see the [KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) constants in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用与方法以获取系统目录。The following example shows how to use with the method to get the System directory. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CPP/getfolderpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CS/getfolderpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/VB/getfolderpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder AdminTools = int32(48)
AdminTools = 48

summary.span: 用于存储各个用户的管理工具的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that is used to store administrative tools for an individual user.

summary.span: Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 会将自定义的控制台保存在此目录中，并且此目录将随用户一起漫游。

span.span: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) will save customized consoles to this directory, and it will roam with the user.

summary.span: 已在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中添加。

span.span: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ApplicationData = int32(26)
ApplicationData = 26

summary.span: 用作当前漫游用户的应用程序特定数据的公共储存库的目录。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data for the current roaming user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 漫游用户在网络上的多台计算机上工作。A roaming user works on more than one computer on a network. 为漫游用户配置文件在网络上的服务器上，并在用户登录时加载到系统上。A roaming user's profile is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CDBurning = int32(59)
CDBurning = 59

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要混淆此目录与桌面文件夹本身，这是虚拟文件夹。Do not confuse this directory with the desktop folder itself, which is a virtual folder.
